name: tpgb/tp-login-register
title: Login & Signup
description: Customize your Login Form, Registration & Signup Form, Password Reset Form for your website.

magicMsg.default:
Hello [tpgb_username]
Here`s your one-click login link you requested for your [tpgb_sitename] account
Login Now
By clicking on the above button you will access your account from [tpgb_email]

If you haven`t requested for the link, no further action is required, the link will automatically expire in 24 hours.

loeroTxt.default: Something went wrong. Please try again.

regemailMsg.default: Dear [tpgb_firstname], Welcome! </br> Thank you for registering at [tpgb_sitename], your account have been created. </br></br> Please find your login details below. </br> Username: [tpgb_username] </br> Password: [tpgb_password] </br></br> Thanks, </br> [tpgb_sitename]

reemvalText.default: An account already exists with this email address.

reeroTxt.default: Something went wrong. Please try again.

lostuTxt.default: Mail sent. Please check your mailbox.

losteroTxt.default: Something went wrong. Please try again.

lostpasMsg.default:
Hello [tpgb_username]
We have received a request to reset your password for [tpgb_sitename].
To set your new password please click here

If you didnt ask for reset, you can safely ignore this email, the link will automatically expire after 24 hours.

Thanks,
[tpgb_sitename]

style.selector: {{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-register-form .tpgb-form-controls input::placeholder,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-login-form .tpgb-form-controls input::placeholder,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-lostpass-form .tpgb-form-controls input::placeholder,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-magic-form .tpgb-form-controls input::placeholder,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-register-form .tpgb-form-controls input,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-login-form .tpgb-form-controls input,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-lostpass-form .tpgb-form-controls input,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-magic-form .tpgb-form-controls input{ text-align : {{foinAlignment}}; }

{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-register-form button.tpgb-register-button,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-login-form button.tpgb-login-button,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-lostpass-form button.tpgb-lost-pass-button ,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-rp-form  button.tpgb-resetpassword-button,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-magic-form button.tpgb-magic-link-button,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-lostpass-form button.tpgb-forget-password-button{ width:100%; max-width : {{formbtnWidth}}; }

{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-register-form button.tpgb-register-button .tpgb-lrbtn-icon,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-login-form button.tpgb-login-button .tpgb-lrbtn-icon,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-lostpass-form button.tpgb-lost-pass-button .tpgb-lrbtn-icon ,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-rp-form  button.tpgb-resetpassword-button .tpgb-lrbtn-icon,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-magic-form button.tpgb-magic-link-button .tpgb-lrbtn-icon,{{PLUS_WRAP}} .tpgb-lostpass-form button.tpgb-forget-password-button .tpgb-lrbtn-icon{ justify-content : {{fobtntxAlign}}; }
